name: 陳惠芬
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1:Introduction
Week 2: General Business
Week 3: Moon Festival中秋節(9/24)
Week 4: Finance & Budgeting
Week 5: Corporate Development
Week 6: Offices
Week 7: Personnel
Week 8: Review
Week 9: Mid-term (11/5)
Week 10: Purchasing
Week 11: Technical Areas
Week 12: Housing & Corporate Property
Week 13: Travel
Week 14: Dining out
Week 15: Entertainment
Week 16: Health
Week 17: Bridging Holiday調整放假 (12/31)
Week 18: Final Exam (1/7)
scorePolicy:
Mid-term 期中考: 30%
Final Exam期末考: 30%
Attendance/Participation出勤與上課參與: 40%
materials: 新版多益13大情境 學習指南
